Welcome to RegattaHub,

Our goal is to help race committees and instructors build better sailing courses faster. We believe better courses make sailing more fun. Learn more...

Get started by building a course

You are currently looking at an early development of the program. Please play with absolutely everything, and if you like it, share with your friends. We are working on a standalone app and many other features. This site will be updated as those features come out. Stay tuned for more updates.

Contact us with any suggestions or thoughts you have on the RegattaHub or if you want to get involved in the project.
